# misparkreportviewer

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.com/chintanp/misparkreportviewer.svg?token=LPthxb7HiH7w9S16jHeG&branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/chintanp/misparkreportviewer)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of misparkreportviewer is to show the submitted misparking reports. 

## Installation

You can install the released version of misparkreportviewer from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("misparkreportviewer")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(misparkreportviewer)
## basic example code
```
